title: ServiceNow URL Encoder
body:
You know how sometimes the links from ServiceNow (SNOW) won't work when you put them into a Word document? This is often due to Word’s encoding. While a registry fix exists, it's not practical for external recipients.

This tool modifies the URL so it works across Word. Copy, paste, done.

Check it out [here](https://chrisjbawden.github.io/blog/bin/encode/encode.html).
